juice.translate: сок, фруктовый сок, горючее, бензин, сущность, электроэнергия, электрический ток
examples: She has no juice left.
A carton of orange juice

We drank orange juice with breakfast.
They don't burn as much juice anymore.
Okay, turn on the juice.
A coke and a tomato juice, please.
She drank the juice through a straw.
He poured himself a glass of orange juice.
Add lemon juice if desired.
Add a few drops of lemon juice.
There's a juice stain on the floor.
The basis of this drink is orange juice.
It tasted as grape juice but not as sweet.
Juice from the lemon squirted into my eye.
I have orange juice then a cup of powdered coffee.
Juice oozed out of the plum.
Juice dribbled down his chin.
gravy made with real beef juices
Lemon juice adds zing to drinks.
Yeast ferments the sugar in the juice.
He squeezed the juice from the orange.
The juice of lemons yields citric acid.
She spiked the orange juice with vodka.
The orange juice had been spiked with gin.
This machine presses vegetables into juice.
I'll go and sponge this juice off my dress.
Squeeze a bit of lemon juice onto the fish.
The machines extract the juice from the apples.
We can use tonic water or orange juice as mixers.
example_translate: Она совсем без сил.

На полу — пятно от сока.
